const handleSubmitComment=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!newComment.trim())return;try{setSubmitting(true);const response=await commentsAPI.create(proposalId,{content:newComment.trim()});if(response.data.success){setComments(prev=>[response.data.data,...prev]);setNewComment('');toast.success('Comment added successfully');// Scroll to top to show new comment

const days=Math.floor(diffInHours/24);return`${days} day${days!==1?'s':''} ago`;}else{return date.toLocaleDateString();}};// Get user initials
